content.rendered:
Directed by Prashanth Neel

Written by Prashanth Neel

Star Yash (Rocky). Sanjay Dutt (Adheera). Raveena Tandon (Ramika Sen). Srinidhi Shetty (Reena). Achyuth Kumar (Guru Pandian). Prakash Raj (Vijayendra Ingalgi). Rao Ramesh (Kanneganti Raghavan). Malavika Avinash (Deepa Hegde). T.S. Nagabharana (Srinivas). Easwari Rao (Fathima). Archana Jois (Shanthamma). Harish Rai (Khasim). Ayyappa P. Sharma (Vanaram). Balakrishna (Inayat Khalil). Saran Shakthi (Farmaan). B.S. Avinash (Andrews). Lakki Lakshman (Rajendra Desai). Vasishta N. Simha (Kamal). Dinesh Mangaluru (Shetty). Tarak Ponnappa (Daya). Ramachandra Raju (Garuda (archive footage)). Vinay Bidappa (Virat). Ashok Sharma (Young Anand Ingalgi). Mohan Juneja (Nagaraju). Govinde Gowda (Peon at 24 / News). John Kokken (John). Krishnappa Kgf (Rocky’s Father). Srinivasa Murthy (Narayan)

Language Kannada

Producers Vijay Kiragandur

Production Hombale Films
